issue.title: [Flight][Go] Add BasicAuth and BearerToken handlers for Go
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11466](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11466). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Like ARROW-10487 did for C++ flight clients, there should be helpers to make it easier for Basic Authentication via base64 encoding and bearer tokens in the Go Flight client and server.
